verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in the <S%H7970>thirtieth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> month, in the <S%H2568>fifth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> as I was <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1473>captives<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H3529>Chebar,<s%> that the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> were <S%H6605>opened,<s%> and I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H4759>visions<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
In the <S%H2568>fifth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H1958>which<s%> was the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3112>Jehoiachin's<s%> <S%H1546>captivity,<s%>

The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> expressly to <S%H3168>Ezekiel<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H941>Buzi,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3779>Chaldeans<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar;<s%> and the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H8033>there<s%> on him.

And I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H7307>whirlwind<s%> <S%H5591><s%> <S%H935>came<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and a <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3947>enfolding<s%> itself, and a <S%H5051>brightness<s%> was <S%H5439>about<s%> it, and out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> thereof as the <S%H5869>color<s%> of <S%H2830>amber,<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

Also out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> thereof came the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>creatures.<s%> And <S%H2088>this<s%> was their <S%H4758>appearance;<s%> they had the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of a <S%H120>man.<s%>
And every <S%H259>one<s%> had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6440>faces,<s%> and every <S%H259>one<s%> had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

And their <S%H7272>feet<s%> were <S%H3474>straight<s%> <S%H7272>feet;<s%> and the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of their <S%H7272>feet<s%> was like the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of a <S%H5695>calf's<s%> <S%H7272>foot:<s%> and they <S%H5340>sparkled<s%> like the <S%H5869>color<s%> of <S%H7044>burnished<s%> <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

And they had the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> their <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>sides;<s%> and they <S%H702>four<s%> had their <S%H6440>faces<s%> and their <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

Their <S%H3671>wings<s%> were <S%H2266>joined<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> to <S%H269>another;<s%> they <S%H5437>turned<s%> not when they <S%H3212>went;<s%> they <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5676>straight<s%> <S%H6440>forward.<s%>

As for the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of their <S%H6440>faces,<s%> they <S%H702>four<s%> had the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H120>man,<s%> and the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H738>lion,<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>side:<s%> and they <S%H702>four<s%> had the <S%H6440>face<s%> of an <S%H7794>ox<s%> on the <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H8040>side;<s%> they <S%H702>four<s%> also had the <S%H6440>face<s%> of an <S%H5404>eagle.<s%>

Thus were their <S%H6440>faces:<s%> and their <S%H3671>wings<s%> were <S%H6504>stretched<s%> <S%H4605>upward;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> wings of <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> were <S%H2266>joined<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H376>another,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> their <S%H1472>bodies.<s%>

And they <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5676>straight<s%> <S%H6440>forward:<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was to <S%H3212>go,<s%> they <S%H3212>went;<s%> and they <S%H5437>turned<s%> not when they <S%H3212>went.<s%>

As for the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>creatures,<s%> their <S%H4758>appearance<s%> was like <S%H1197>burning<s%> <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> and like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H3940>lamps:<s%> it <S%H1980>went<s%> up and down <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>creatures;<s%> and the <S%H784>fire<s%> was <S%H5051>bright,<s%> and out of the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H1300>lightning.<s%>
And the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>creatures<s%> <S%H7519>ran<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a <S%H965>flash<s%> of <S%H965>lightning.<s%>

Now as I <S%H7200>beheld<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>creatures,<s%> <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H212>wheel<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> by the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>creatures,<s%> with his <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6440>faces.<s%>

The <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%> and their <S%H4639>work<s%> was like to the <S%H5869>color<s%> of a <S%H8658>beryl:<s%> and they <S%H702>four<s%> had <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1823>likeness:<s%> and their <S%H4758>appearance<s%> and their <S%H4639>work<s%> was as it were a <S%H212>wheel<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of a <S%H212>wheel.<s%>
When they <S%H3212>went,<s%> they <S%H3212>went<s%> on their <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>sides:<s%> and they <S%H5437>turned<s%> not when they <S%H3212>went.<s%>

As for their <S%H1354>rings,<s%> they were so <S%H1362>high<s%> that they were <S%H3374>dreadful;<s%> and their <S%H1354>rings<s%> were <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about them <S%H702>four.<s%>

And when the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>creatures<s%> <S%H3212>went,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> by them: and when the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>creatures<s%> were <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> were <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up.

<S%H5921>Wherever<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was to <S%H3212>go,<s%> they <S%H3212>went,<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> was their <S%H7307>spirit<s%> to <S%H3212>go;<s%> and the <S%H212>wheels<s%> were <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up <S%H5980>over<s%> <S%H5980>against<s%> them: for the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>creature<s%> was in the <S%H212>wheels.<s%>

When those <S%H3212>went,<s%> these <S%H3212>went;<s%> and when those <S%H5975>stood,<s%> these <S%H5975>stood;<s%> and when those were <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> were <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up <S%H5980>over<s%> <S%H5980>against<s%> them: for the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>creature<s%> was in the <S%H212>wheels.<s%>

And the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> on the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>creature<s%> was as the <S%H5869>color<s%> of the <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H7140>crystal,<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> forth <S%H5921>over<s%> their <S%H7218>heads<s%> <S%H4605>above.<s%>

And <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> were their <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H3474>straight,<s%> the <S%H802>one<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H269>other:<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> had <S%H8147>two,<s%> which <S%H3680>covered<s%> on <S%H2007>this<s%> side, and <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> had <S%H8147>two,<s%> which <S%H3680>covered<s%> on that side, their <S%H1472>bodies.<s%>

And when they <S%H3212>went,<s%> I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of their <S%H3671>wings,<s%> like the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> as the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H1999>speech,<s%> as the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of an <S%H4264>host:<s%> when they <S%H5975>stood,<s%> they <S%H7503>let<s%> <S%H7503>down<s%> their <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

And there was a <S%H6963>voice<s%> from the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> that was <S%H5921>over<s%> their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> when they <S%H5975>stood,<s%> and had <S%H7503>let<s%> <S%H7503>down<s%> their <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

And <S%H4605>above<s%> the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> that was <S%H5921>over<s%> their <S%H7218>heads<s%> was the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of a <S%H3678>throne,<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a <S%H5601>sapphire<s%> <S%H68>stone:<s%> and on the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the <S%H3678>throne<s%> was the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> on it.

And I <S%H7200>saw<s%> as the <S%H5869>color<s%> of <S%H2830>amber,<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about <S%H1004>within<s%> it, from the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of his <S%H4975>loins<s%> even <S%H4605>upward,<s%> and from the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of his <S%H4975>loins<s%> even <S%H4295>downward,<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> as it were the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> and it had <S%H5051>brightness<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

As the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H7198>bow<s%> that is in the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H1653>rain,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> was the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about. <S%H1931>This<s%> was the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> And when I <S%H7200>saw<s%> it, I <S%H5307>fell<s%> on my <S%H6440>face,<s%> and I <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of one that <S%H1696>spoke.<s%>
